comments.raw_text:
User Agent:  

Steps to reproduce:

Open Testcase, follow the STR.


Actual results:

The selection prepared according to the STR contains excess characters.


Expected results:

Selection should not contain excess characters.
comments.author: kdevel@vogtner.de

comments.text: selectionStart/selectionEnd do not represent the visible selection. (Testcase extended).

comments.creator: jstutte@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Bulk-downgrade of unassigned, >=5 years untouched DOM/Storage bugs' priority.

If you have reason to believe this is wrong (especially for the severity), please write a comment and ni :jstutte.
